info.title: Hourly API
info.description: This is an API for the Hourly Office Hours Application. Many operations require an authentication token to be called.

tags.name: Courses
tags.description: Course information stored on the site

tags.name: Office Hours
tags.description: Office Hours for the courses stored

tags.name: Registrations
tags.description: Registrations for a specific office hours session

tags.name: Office Hour Questions
tags.description: Questions for a specific office hours session

tags.name: Office Hour Feedback
tags.description: Feedback for an office hours seesion

post.summary: Create a new course for the site

requestBody.description: JSON object for the course to be added

get.summary: gets course with a specific id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: course code, label as code in params

post.summary: Adds a user to the roster

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: User Id to add to roster

get.summary: Gets the roster for the course

delete.summary: Removes a user from the course roster

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Course Id to alter roster for

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User id to remove from course

post.summary: Cancels office hours for a specific day
Registers for office hours for a specific date and time

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of office hours to register for

get.summary: gets office hours for a specific course id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of course to get office hours for

get.summary: gets registrations for a specific office hour

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of office hours to get registrations for

get.summary: gets questions for a specific office hour on specific date

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of office hours to get questions for

post.summary: adds feedback for a specific registration

get.summary: gets feedback for a specific host for that course
gets a users informations
gets a users courses
gets a users registrations for all of their courses
gets a users registrations for a course

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: Course Id to get registrations for

get.summary: gets a users office hours they are hosting for a course

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: Course Id to get office hours being hosted for

get.summary: gets a object representing the number of students registered for an office hour

parameters.name: officehourid
parameters.description: office hour Id to get registrations for

post.summary: creates a new topic tag for registrations for a course
adds a new topic tag for specific registrations

get.summary: gets all topic tags with number of registrations for a specific office hour on specific date

parameters.name: officehourid
parameters.description: office hour Id to get topic tagds for

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date to get topic tags for

get.summary: gets all topic tags for a specific course

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: get topic tags for a course with this courseid

get.summary: gets all topic tags with number of registrations for a specific course

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: get topic tags for a course with count of registrations

get.summary: gets all topic tags with number of registrations for a specific course

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: get topic tags for a course with count of registrations

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: start date to get tags for

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: end date to get tags for

delete.summary: removes a specific topic tag from a course

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: get topic tags for a course with count of registrations

get.summary: gets all notifications for a user

post.summary: adds notification for a specific user

delete.summary: removes all notifications for a specific user
removes specific notification for a specific user

get.summary: gets or starts the queue for the given office hours on the given day
gets the student view of the queue if it is started
gets if the queue has started for a specific office hours

post.summary: adds current user to the waitlist
adds specific student to the no-show list

delete.summary: removes specific student from queue, MAKE SURE TO ADD A date property in the body as a string and a registrationId as a number!!

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: student to be removed from queue

patch.summary: moves student to back of waitlist

get.summary: gets available time intervals for an office hour on a given day

post.summary: creates a topic tag for a course

delete.summary: deletes a topic tag for a course

get.summary: gets role for an account for a course
gets the count of registrations for a course per student
gets the count of registrations for a course per hour time interval
get the number of registrations per office hour per day of week
get the number of registrations per staff for a course
determines if a student is registered for that specific officehours on the date

delete.summary: Deletes all occurances of a specific office hour
Deletes all occurances of a specific office hour after the date. INCLUDE date in the requestBody as the date to cancel office hours from then on
